content: Hello Mister Heine, thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Aziz Trabelsi

content: Hello Aziz, thank you for coming to see the apartment. The proposed rental price is 500 euros per month. Is this something that you are comfortable with?
name: Aziz Trabelsi

content:
I am sorry, but I would need a lower price. I am looking for something more budget-friendly.

Can you consider reducing the rental price to 450 euros per month? Thank you.
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I understand your concern, Aziz. Let me speak with the landlord and see if it is possible to negotiate a lower rental price. In the meantime, can you tell me more about your budget and what you are looking for in terms of the apartment?
name: Aziz Trabelsi

content:
Sure, I am looking for a one-bedroom apartment with a fully equipped kitchen, bathroom, and sleeping area. The apartment should be located in a safe neighborhood. I am also looking for a reasonable amount of natural light and a good view.

I am willing to pay 450 euros per month for an apartment that meets these criteria. Thank you.

Also, can you give me an idea of how much the utility costs would be per month?

Thank you.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
Thank you for providing that information, Aziz. I will speak with the landlord and see if it is possible to negotiate a lower rental price. As for the utilities, the cost will depend on your usage, but on average, it can be around 100-150 euros per month. I will provide you with a detailed breakdown of the costs once we have agreed on the rental price.

In the meantime, do you have any other questions or concerns about the apartment or the neighborhood?
name: Aziz Trabelsi
